game.name: Unusual and not safe experiments
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Unusual and NOT Safe Experiments is an action-puzzle game where you control a robot trying to escape from an abandoned complex, overcoming traps and solving puzzles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Unusual and NOT Safe Experiments is an action-puzzle game where you control a robot trying to escape from an abandoned complex, overcoming traps and solving puzzles.
